extensionDescription.message: Zezwól na tymczasowe użycie HTML w zaznaczonej wiadomości

button_tooltip.message: Tymczasowo zezwól na użycie HTML w zaznaczonej wiadomości.

pref_tab_general_description.message: To prevent malicious code execution (e.g. 'Locky' and 'Tesla') it is recommended to disable the support for HTML, JavaScript and inline Attachments in email.

pref_tab_general_contents_description.message: In case of original HTML some more content options can be set. Based on the options below remote content will be allowed, JavaScript enabled and the display of inline attachments enabled.

pref_remoteContentOption_label.message: Allow remote content in general (not recommended)

pref_forceRemoteContentOption_label.message: Allow remote content for the selected message by click on 'Show HTML'

pref_jsOption_label.message: Always enable JavaScript (this also affects Seamonkeys Browser!)

pref_jsTempOption_label.message: Temporarily enable JavaScript by click on 'Show HTML'

pref_inlineTempOption_label.message: Temporarily show attachments inline by click on 'Show HTML'

pref_tab_help_description.message: Dieser Text muss noch ersetzt werden.
